headline: Securely share text, code, or files between your devices — instantly. No accounts, no fees.

steps.description: Paste your text or code, or upload files up to 50MB in size.
We’ll generate a short, memorable magic words. Keep it private — that’s your key to access.
On any device, visit clipposaurus.com, enter your magic words, and your content is ready.

options.title: Want to share something?
options.description: Drop it. Share it. Done. Your drop key opens it anywhere.

options.title: Got a drop key?
options.description: Unlock your drop with drop key. No accounts, no tracking — just your content.
